resources.string:
What is Intelligence ?
 1."Intelligence is the ability to understand and learn things." - Essential English Dcitionary
 2.“Intelligence is the capacity to act purposefully with the environment” - David Weshlar 
 3.“Intelligence is the general mental adaptibility to new problems and conditions” - W. Stern 
 4.Learning? - Any relatively permanent change in behavior which occurs as a result of experience or practice
 
 What is AI?
 *Study and creation of computer systems that exhibit some form of intelligence.
 *Learn new concepts Reason and draw useful conclusions about the world.
 *Perform other types of feats that require human types of intelligence
